summary: Riverwood is the first place that offers hospitality to the Dragonborn in Skyrim. It\'s a place we\'ve all been to and have connected with, but you\'ve never been able to live there in the vanilla game before.
descriptionHtml:
Riverwood is the first place that offers hospitality to the Dragonborn in Skyrim. It\'s a place we\'ve all been to and have connected with, but you\'ve never been able to live there in the vanilla game before. 


A small shack located right across the road from The Sleeping Giant and Riverwood Trader is now open to you, as a gift from an anonymous person who has placed their trust in your hands. 


*** THE BARRELS AND SACKS OUTSIDE WILL RESET, DO NOT PLACE YOUR ITEMS IN THEM*** 



Features 
--------------------- 
- A nice, quaint house in Riverwood that fits with the theme of the village. 
- Safe storage for all your valuables. 
- A private training room. 
- Weapon racks. 
- Archery targets. 
- Full Nav-Meshing. 
- Alchemy Table. 
- Enchanting Table. 

Changelog 
---------------------- 

Version 1.0 - Release. 

Version 1.1 - Minor Navmesh Fix. 

Version 1.2 - Added Wall Fixings. 

Version 2.0 - Completely redone Cellar/Upstairs. 

Version 2.1 - Navmesh Fix. 

Version 2.2 - Shelf Clutter, Ingredients and Hanging Ingredients. Fixed Hay Scatters. 

Version 3.0 - Navmesh Fix, Added Ivy, Rugs, Map. 

Version 3.1 - Picture Fix.

Version 4.0 - Fixed Note. 

The main goal of this house is to make a player home that does not compromise the feel of the village it is in. I made it in best mind to keep as many amenities as possible available to the player, but keep a nice feel going on throughout the entire house, while being functional all the way throughout. Riverwood isn\'t a rich village, it is small, quiet, and quaint, and I made the house to reflect that. Enjoy. 

STEAM VERSION: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=152886047
author: Kuiyra
